00015 #include "os_core.h"

00017 #if CONFIG_OS_USE_TICK_COUNTER == true
00018 void os_task_delay(os_tick_t tick_nb)
00019 {
00020     extern volatile os_tick_t tick_counter;
00021 
00022     os_tick_t start_tick, last_tick;
00023     start_tick = tick_counter;
00024     last_tick = tick_counter + tick_nb;
00025     // Check if the counter has been wrapped
00026     if (last_tick < start_tick) {
00027         while (tick_counter > start_tick) {
00028             os_yield();
00029         }
00030     }
00031     while (tick_counter < last_tick) {
00032         os_yield();
00033     }
00034 }
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 bool os_task_create(struct os_task *task, os_proc_ptr_t task_ptr, os_ptr_t args,
00038         int stack_size, enum os_task_option options)
00039 {
00040 #if CONFIG_OS_USE_MALLOC == true
00041     if (!(options & OS_TASK_USE_CUSTOM_STACK)) {
00042         // Allocate memory for the stack size
00043         if (!(task->stack = os_malloc(stack_size))) {
00044             return false;
00045         }
00046     }
00047 #endif
00048 #if CONFIG_OS_DEBUG == true
00049     HOOK_OS_DEBUG_TASK_ADD();
00050 #endif
00051     // Save the options
00052     task->options = options;
00053     // Move the SP pointer to the end of the stack
00054     os_task_get_process(task)->sp = &task->stack[stack_size];
00055     // Set process type
00056     os_task_get_process(task)->type = OS_PROCESS_TYPE_TASK;
00057 #if CONFIG_OS_USE_PRIORITY == true
00058     os_task_set_priority(task, CONFIG_OS_TASK_DEFAULT_PRIORITY);
00059 #endif
00060     // Load context
00061     if (!os_process_context_load(&task->core, task_ptr, args)) {
00062         return false;
00063     }
00064     // Enable the task
00065     if (!(options & OS_TASK_DISABLE)) {
00066         os_task_enable(task);
00067     }
00068 
00069     return true;
00070 }
00071 
00072 struct os_task *os_task_get_current(void)
00073 {
00074     extern struct os_process *os_current_process;
00075     if (os_process_is_task(os_current_process)) {
00076         return os_task_from_process(os_current_process);
00077     }
00078     return NULL;
00079 }
